room_title: Escape room "Escape From Wizard School" by Puzzle Room Austin in Austin
review: We had such a super fun time tonight at the Puzzle Room! AND....we escaped the Wizard Room with only 3 seconds to go! Great team....great staff and amazingly creative puzzles. Wow!

room_title: Escape room "Escape From Wizard School" by Puzzle Room Austin in Austin
review: Superb puzzle room. Very helpful staff! With their help we solved the room with :30 seconds to spare;)

room_title: Escape room "Escape From Wizard School" by Puzzle Room Austin in Austin
review: I highly recommend this establishment for an hour of pure fun and excitement! We went with six teenagers last night for a sweet 16 celebration and had a blast. Easy to find; enjoyable people; instructions were very helpful and hints were given but not to the point that you didn't feel like you were solving it yourself. We won with a minute to spare! I would love to go again and check out the other rooms in the future!!!!
